str2: From an adverb form of hode; in this same spot, i.e. Here or hither.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To seek, search for, desire, require, demand. Of uncertain affinity; to seek; specially, to worship, or to plot.
A household manager, a steward, guardian.
In order that, so that. Probably from the same as the former part of heautou; in order that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolonged form of a primary heuro, which heureo is used for it in all the tenses except the present and imperfect to find.
Trustworthy, faithful, believing. From peitho; objectively, trustworthy; subjectively, trustful.
